      • deplete

        public java.lang.String deplete()
        depletes the player's resources as they travel the trail. resources deplete faster as the player's travel rate increases and the weather worsens
        Returns:
        a non empty string if the party dies

        public java.lang.String randomEvent()

        Returns:
        a string with the resulting event
